name: Potty Knight Saga
description:
Player Wanted

For hazardous journey, bitter condition, long months of complete darkness, constant danger, safe return doubtful, honor and recognition in case of success.

POTTY Knight Saga


Potty Knight Saga is a platformer action game heavily focused on very difficult level design.
This game is so simple. easy for anyone to play and focused on playing fun.
But it's not easy to clear this game

Developer's words
Korean gamer's talent is already recognized not only in Korea but in the world-wide
What those Korean gamers said the most after playing in the biggest game show in Korea

Scream! Real Screaming!!

The developer of this game spoke confidently
"Does this game look cute?, But this game is the pinnacle of the challenge"

And a word that's hidden inside
"I'm looking forward to your screams :)"

So what kind of game is it?
The controls are simple but It's an adventure game with a very difficult level!

Can you overcome this game?

Key Features, Summarized:



  • The various enemies and traps that stand in your way
The various pitfalls of this game make it fun. Of course, it makes you scream

  • Rich in atmosphere
Outstanding! Every scenes that feel unique and charming at a glance

  • Creedence but Difficult to master
You can be easy to enjoy game immediately without advance information.
But We need a strategy to counter them.
